programme.title: End of the Gulf War
programme.short_synopsis: How long can President Bush hold onto his Gulf War glory?
programme.medium_synopsis: The Gulf War (1990-91) is over and President Bush Snr basks in its glory, but Cooke reflects on the fickle nature of opinion polls and whether public approval will be sustainable.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: End of the Gulf War

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
